Title: Calling All Dracthyr!
Description:
<This flyer is illustrated with inviting sketches of dracthyr eating, sparring, and having fun.>

Calling all dracthyr!

Do you feel adrift after the events of the underground? Do you want to bond with your creche mates? Do you just need someone to talk to?

Come join us at Weyrnrest for food, fun, and camaraderie! ALL dracthyr welcome!
ObjectivesText: Go to the party at Weyrnrest in Valdrakken.
